participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, I am passionate about helping others and expressing myself through writing.
participant_1.background: I love to use my passion for writing to help my students learn and grow. I ride my red bike to work every day. I enjoy swimming, hiking, and spending time with my family. My favourite band is Rush. I like to go to the farmers markets to buy local veggies and fruits.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and artistic, I thrive on creativity and enjoy spending time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active. My brother and I have bright red hair. I like to dance. I spend my days working on custom upholstery projects, coming up with new designs for my clothes, and playing board games with friends. I'd rather sleep in, but I do love spending time with my family.

content.text: Hello, my name is Sarah.
Hi Sarah, my name is Sarah too!
That's funny! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to dance, paint, and play board games with friends.
Those are all great hobbies! I like to swim, hike, and read.
I love to read, too! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I'd have to say "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
I've never read that one, but I've heard good things. I'll have to check it out!
You should! It's a classic.
I will!
What do you do for work?
I'm a custom upholsterer. I make custom furniture and other pieces for people's homes.
That sounds like a really interesting job!
It is! I love being creative and working with my hands.
I can imagine!
I'd love to see some of your paintings sometime.
Sure, I'd love to show you!
Great!
So, what's your favorite band?
Rush!
Really? Me too!
Wow, that's awesome! I've been a fan since I was a little kid.
Me too! They're my favorite band of all time.
Mine too!
We should go to a concert together sometime!
That would be awesome
